author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Avoid direct reference to CLHEP utilities and change the debug printings

#### PR validation:

Makes use of standard runTheMatrix.py with l=limited

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Standard checks are made and it is not meant for back porting
title: Run2-hcx190 Avoid direct reference to CLHEP
